description: This header file defines functions to create message objects related to camera events (added, removed, updated) for communication with a server in a smart camera management system.

methods.name: createCameraAddedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message indicating a new camera has been added.

methods.name: createCameraRemovedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message indicating a camera has been removed.

methods.name: createCameraUpdatedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message indicating a camera has been updated.
